mapper.insert: insert into partyBbs(id, title, content, image, wdate, del, readcount, tag, partyType, people, likey, hate, place, mdate, applyMem, endParty, fullParty) values ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, now(), 0, 0, #{tag}, #{partytype}, #{people}, 0, 0, #{place}, #{mdate}, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update partybbs set del = 1 where partySeq = #{partySeq}
update partybbs set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where partySeq = #{partySeq}
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number()over(order by wdate desc) as rnum, partySeq, id, title, content, image, wdate, del, readcount, tag, partyType, people, likey, hate, place, mdate, applyMem, endParty, fullParty from partyBbs order by wdate desc) a

select * from (select row_number()over(order by wdate desc) as rnum, partySeq, id, title, content, image, wdate, del, readcount, tag, partyType, people, likey, hate, place, mdate, applyMem, endParty, fullParty from partyBbs where 1=1
and title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del =0
and content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del =0
and id=#{search} and del =0
and tag=#{tag}
order by wdate desc) a
where rnum between ${start} and ${end}

select ifnull(count(*), 0) from partyBbs
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
where id=#{search}
